Lookup Tables¶

Instrbuilder supports lookup tables that map values sent to and received from the instrument to more human-readable intrepretations. Lookup tables are never required, but may ease development. The lookup table is read from lookup.csv.

Example of lookup table entry for the SRS810 filter slope (filt_slope).¶
command value name
filt_slope 0 6-db/oct
  1 12-db/oct
  2 18-db/oct
  3 24-db/oct
